value.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore Azure services for performing data analytics, and explore the features of Azure Synapse Analytics.

value.title: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn about Azure Table Storage, Azure Blob Storage, Azure File Storage, and Azure Cosmos DB, and explore situations for using them.

images.title: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure

value.title: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to provision and configure Azure Cosmos DB, Azure Data Lake , Azure Blob Storage, and Azure File Storage.

images.title: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure

value.title: Export large amounts of data from Azure by using Azure Import/Export
value.excerpt: Evaluate Azure Import/Export to copy data from Azure Blob storage to an on-premises server. Create an export job in your Azure Storage account. Get the BitLocker keys to unlock the drives that you receive.

images.title: Export large amounts of data from Azure by using Azure Import/Export

value.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure Data Lake Storage provides a cloud storage service that is highly available, secure, durable, scalable, and redundant and brings new efficiencies to processing big data analytics workloads.

images.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage

value.excerpt: Learn about the history and motivation behind data science

images.title: Learn the data science method

value.excerpt: Use neural network models to make predictions. Change neural network structures to refine predictions using TensorFlow and Keras.

value.excerpt: Protect your back-end APIs from information exposure and implement throttling to prevent resource exhaustion with policies in Azure API Management.

value.title: Query relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn about Structured Query Language (SQL), and how you can use it to query, insert, update, and delete data in a relational database.

images.title: Query relational data in Azure

value.title: Read text with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: Optical character recognition (OCR) enables artificial intelligence (AI) systems to read text in images, enabling applications to extract information from photographs, scanned documents, and other sources of digitized text.

images.title: Read text with the Computer Vision service

value.title: Resolve security threats with Azure Security Center
value.excerpt: In this module, youâ€™ll use the alert capabilities of Azure Security Center to watch for and respond to threats.

value.excerpt: Run Selenium UI tests, a form of functional testing, in Azure Pipelines.

value.excerpt: Learn to search and organize repository history by using filters, blame, and cross-linking on GitHub.

value.excerpt: Add authentication and authorization to an ASP.NET Core web app using the Identity framework.

value.excerpt: Understand the architecture of an Azure Databricks Spark Cluster and Spark Jobs.

value.excerpt: Learn how to synthesize text to speech using the Speech-to-Text service.

value.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure Stream Analytics jobs to process input data, transform it with a query, and return results.

value.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
value.excerpt: Learn various ways to upload data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2. Upload data through the Azure portal, Azure Storage Explorer, or .NET. Or copy the data in Azure Data Factory.

images.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore modern data warehouse analytics in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn the fundamentals of database concepts in a cloud environment, get basic skilling in cloud data services, and build your foundational knowledge of cloud data services within Microsoft Azure. You will explore the processing options available for building data analytics solutions in Azure. You will explore Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Databricks, and Azure HDInsight.

topItems.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse
topItems.excerpt: Examine the components of a modern data warehouse. Understand the role of services like Azure Databricks, Azure Synapse Analytics, and Azure HDInsight. See how to use Azure Synapse Analytics to load and process data.

images.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse

topItems.title: Explore data ingestion in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore the different data ingestion options available when you are building a data warehouse with Azure. See how to use Azure Data Factory to ingest data into a data warehouse.

images.title: Explore data ingestion in Azure

topItems.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore Azure services for performing data analytics, and explore the features of Azure Synapse Analytics.

images.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure
Examine components of a modern data warehouse

value.title: Cloud administration basics
value.excerpt:
Learn about the basics of the cloud, including the history, building blocks, and types of services, in preparation for real-world cloud practice on Azure.
In this learning path, you will:

Learn about the history of the cloud, and how it was built
Know the major cloud providers and cloud types
Understand what types of resources are available through the cloud
Recognize cloud service modules
Know the economic benefits of the cloud
Understand digital identity, and how digital identities can be shared and secured

In partnership with Dr. Majd Sakr and Carnegie Mellon University.

topItems.title: Foundations of cloud computing for administrators
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the cloud, including the history, building blocks, and types on your way to becoming a Cloud Administrator.

images.title: Foundations of cloud computing for administrators

topItems.title: Provision and manage cloud services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the different types of resources available on the cloud and the technology behind how they work.

images.title: Provision and manage cloud services

topItems.title: Secure your cloud resources with access control
topItems.excerpt: Learn about digital identities and how they can be managed and synchronized within an organization.

images.title: Secure your cloud resources with access control
Foundations of cloud computing for administrators

value.title: Introduction to machine learning with Python and Azure Notebooks
value.excerpt: Python has become a dominant language for doing data analysis with machine learning. Learn how to leverage Python and associated libraries in Jupyter Notebooks run on Azure Notebooks to predict patterns and identify trends.

topItems.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks
topItems.excerpt: Create an Azure Notebook and use three popular Python libraries to analyze climate data collected by NASA, then share it.

images.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

topItems.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python
topItems.excerpt: Import airline arrival data into a Jupyter notebook and use Pandas to clean it. Then, build a machine learning model with Scikit-Learn and use Matplotlib to visualize output.

images.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python

topItems.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
topItems.excerpt: Keras is a high-level neural networks API, written in Python, that runs on top of other deep learning tools such as TensorFlow. This module uses Keras to build a neural network that scores text, such as user reviews for sentiment.

images.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

value.title: Process and classify images with the Azure Cognitive Vision Services
value.excerpt: Microsoft Cognitive Services offers pre-built functionality to enable computer vision functionality in your applications.  Learn how to use the Cognitive Vision Services to detect faces, tag and classify images, and identify objects.

topItems.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the Computer Vision API in Azure that allows you to identify facial details in pictures.

images.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services

topItems.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service
topItems.excerpt: Use the Computer Vision API to analyze images for insights, extract text from images, and generate high-quality thumbnails.

images.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service

topItems.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
topItems.excerpt: Create, train and test a custom image classification model using the Custom Vision Service to accurately identify paintings from famous artists.

images.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services

value.title: Process and Translate Speech with Azure Cognitive Speech Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to implement the Speech services found in Azure Cognitive Services by performing speech-to-text transcription, synthesizing text input to speech, performing speech translation, and implementing speaker recognition in your AI infused applications.

topItems.title: Transcribe speech input to text
topItems.excerpt: Speech-to-text from the speech service,  known as speech recognition, enables real time transcription of audio streams into text. Your applications, tools, or devices can consume, display, and take action on this text as command input.

images.title: Transcribe speech input to text

topItems.title: Synthesize Text Input to Speech
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to synthesize text to speech using the Speech-to-Text service.

images.title: Synthesize Text Input to Speech

topItems.title: Translate speech with the speech service
topItems.excerpt: Perform speech translation tasks with the speech service to translate spoken text to different languages.

images.title: Translate speech with the speech service
Transcribe speech input to text

value.title: Add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Add your custom domain to Azure Active Directory. Add DNS information to the domain registrar. Verify your custom domain name in the Azure portal and set it as the primary.

images.title: Add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory
